name: Momentum (itch) (pawprints)
description:
A minimalist platformer about building momentum — and letting go.

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020  in 48 hours 29 hours (I spent the first 19 hours on a different idea).

How to play:

  • Use arrow keys to move left/right,  hold spacebar to hover
  • Jump into the floating green areas for a speed boost — at the expense of losing control of your momentum
  • Get to the door to complete the level and avoid the glowing red stuff!

Credits:

  • Made with the Replay game engine
  • Sprites taken with permission from HUGE pixelart asset pack (and apologies to the creator for implementing in such a basic fashion!)
  • Music: Ideetje (extended) by RoccoW
  • Sound effects:
    • https://freesound.org/people/PlanetroniK/sounds/399884/
    • https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/270311/
    • https://freesound.org/people/AndreWharn/sounds/501207/
    • https://freesound.org/people/shimsewn/sounds/39100/
